titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the discovery and apprehending of several persons justly suspected to have contrived and acted in the felonious burning of houses in and about the city of London
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the fourth day of May 1679. In the one and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
